version_description:
GCash gives you more reasons to love the way you pay!

In this new release, you can now experience a new way to pay cashless by scanning the QR code of participating merchants, continue to use the in-app generated QR code with stronger security feat

We’re giving you more reasons to love the way you pay with GCash. But this time, for booking movies!
In this release, we partnered with GMovies so you can conveniently buy tickets from any partner cinema that accepts GCash. We also re-designed the Dash

In this release, you can now Cash-In through your RCBC account and view all of our major GCash Partner Outlets! We also improved security, squashed some bugs, and enhanced your user experience and interface.

In this mid-month release, borrowing load for yourself is now quick and easy! We also squashed some bugs and improved user interface for an even better app experience. You will really #LoveTheWayYouPay with GCash!

Spread the love, share GCash! For this release, we made GCash referrals to friends and loved ones more fun and rewarding! We also improved Buy Load, Send Money, and Pay Bills so that your most frequent contacts and account numbers are readily available wi

Forgotten your MPIN? Worry not! With this update, you can reset your MPIN all by yourself within the app! We've also added a Promos section for you to maximize your GCash experience on top of our usual UX/UI enhancements and bug fixes.

Need to quickly fund your GCash wallet? Generate a barcode in-app to easily top-up your account via thousands of 7-Eleven outlets nationwide. Want to keep in touch with your loved ones? Buy Load and enjoy GoSurf50, Combo15 and many others! On top of these

Need to quickly fund your GCash wallet? Generate a barcode in-app to easily top-up your account via thousands of 7-Eleven outlets nationwide. Want to keep in touch with your love ones? Buy Load and enjoy rebates for GoSurf50! On top of these awesome new f

GCash now brings you closer to your loved ones here and abroad! For this release, we have partnered with the leading money transfer company MoneyGram International so your remittance can now be received directly to your GCash account from over 200 countri

Cash-In options just got better! For this release, we added Western Union so that remittances from your family and loved-ones can now be received directly to your GCash account from over 550,000 agent locations in over 200 countries worldwide. We also str

Looking for more ways to enjoy GCash? In this release, start enrolling your MasterCard/Visa debit cards for more cash in options. We’re also kicking off payments to participating merchants through a barcode generated straight from the app. With all these

GCash has cool updates to beat the summer heat this release! We can now introduce our our services to new users to help them get started. To improve the app experience of our existing users, we’ve also updated the existing services such as providing more

Make way for more updates as we grow our GCash community! We further enhanced Buy Load to give you more flexibility in choosing the right package or promo— not just for Globe/TM, but also for other network. We've also optimized a lot of our features as we

Here at GCash, we keep on innovating to make your life easier and more convenient! For this release, you can now pay your bills using GCredit! We also partnered with UnionBank so you can link your eligible accounts to give you more options for cashing in.

Come rain or shine, your GCash experience keeps getting better and better! For this release, GCash enables you to take a first step towards a better financial future by allowing you to invest on money market fund inside the app. This and a few more enhanc

GCash continuously find innovative ways to make your experience better!  For this release, we combined the power of facial recognition and optical character recognition (OCR) to streamline and speed up the Account Verification (aka Know-Your-Customer or K

WHAT’S NEW IN THIS RELEASE
GCash brings further convenience and ease of use for your everyday payments in this release! Get higher credit limit for establishing good behavior every time you use GCash and GCredit; Find the nearest outlet or learn how to

More GCash enhancements are heading your way! In this update, we’re enabling users to send money to banks via InstaPay. We further optimized our eKYC (Know-Your-Customer) with OCR and facial recognition. You can also start getting coupons from our partici

GCash got your back with another smashing update! We’re starting things off by improving your cash-in experience with one of your favorite banks! We’ve enhanced our KYC experience so that it’s easier for you to get verified. Your cash-in and cash-out expe

Greet the Chinese New Year with GCash and its new fun feature. Need to Send Money to 10 people? In this release, use Ang Pao to send money up to 10 recipients in one go. You can even choose from a variety of red envelope themes for a more customized touch

GCash is leading the scene and keeping it green! In this release we want you to join us in being one with the environment with GCash Forest! An exclusive feature in this month’s update that lets GCash users make their mark on planet earth! Aside from that
